attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2005-2178

Date: 2005-11-22

Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que monsieur Allan R. Rowsell, de la ville de Pickering dans la province de l'Ontario, un avocat, soit nommé juge de la section de la Cour de la famille de la Cour supérieure de justice, et juge d'office de la Cour d'appel de l'Ontario.


The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advise that Allan R. Rowsell, Esquire, of the City of Pickering in the Province of Ontario, Barrister-at-law, be appointed a Judge of the Family Court branch of the Superior Court of Justice, and a Judge ex officio of the Court of Appeal for Ontario.

The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advise that Allan R. Rowsell, Esquire, of the City of Pickering in the Province of Ontario, Barrister-at-law, be appointed a Judge of the Family Court branch of the Superior Court of Justice, and a Judge ex officio of the Court of Appeal for Ontario.
